examples.text: Bu sabah toplanan konseyde umumî kâtip Eküatör'ün milletler cemiyetine iltihaka karar verdiğini bildirmiştir.
examples.translation: At the council held this morning, the general secretary announced that the Ecuador had decided to join the League of Nations.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish التحاق, from Arabic اِلْتِحَاق (iltiḥāq), verbal noun of اِلْتَحَقَ (iltaḥaqa, “to join, accede”).
